website_summaries.verdict: Featuring up to 15 hours of burn time per votive candle, as well as multiple size and color options, there is likely a set of Royal Imports candles for your needs.
pros: Available in 2 sizes for either 10 or 15 hours of burn time, and 3 colors: black, ivory, and white
cons: Candles do not include votive holder

customer_reviews.title: Candle crumbs
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. These came crumbling out of the package all broken, wax crumbs everywhere. They were only in a bubble wrap envelope and the box was flimsy and open, so when I took it out it was a mess. Maybe half the candles were useable. I have submitted a review twice but they didn’t post it, so I hope this one goes through!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Mazochi

customer_reviews.title: Why no box lids?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Good candles, with strong wicks. They last, more or less, as promised. We get anywhere between 13-18 hours with them depending on how much was left over from the candle before. My only gripe is with the box. Why do these boxes not have lids?! Like pretty much everyone else here, the candles were knocked around and rolling loose in the Amazon box. Luckily none of them were broken, so that's cool. but still, whats up with that???
customer_reviews.author: enero30

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I took a chance and ordered these
customer_reviews.text: I live in the area of California where we are experiencing days without power due to PG&E shut offs. So far in this month we are on our 3rd Power shut down. I alway keep candles in my house because I love burning candles and I also live up at 3000 ft elevation were we sometimes will lose power due to weather. My box came in perfect condition and I have already tested the candles out. They did last around 9-10 hours. What a great buy. I purchase candles A LOT, these are a great find. Much better than purchasing candles from Michael's, Walmart, or Target.
customer_reviews.author: Girly Hobbies

customer_reviews.title: a neat holiday gift
customer_reviews.text: I know some folks (including myself) who have beautiful crystal tealight-holders, and I wanted to give those folks some votive candles to use in those tealight-holders. However, it's very hard to find votive candles that will fit into the rather small tealight holes. Perhaps I am being very foolish to try to put votive candles into tealight-holders, but that is what I wanted, and luckily I found them here. This brand was the smallest width that I could find on Amazon, and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: JohnJ

customer_reviews.title: Scentless and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Used these in glass votive holders for my wedding. They stayed lit the whole time (about 4.5 hours) and they did not have a scent, just looked really pretty in the votive holder.
customer_reviews.author: elise

customer_reviews.title: Pack more secure!
customer_reviews.text: One box of 72 candles came with box crushed and candles all over the place!! I am disabled, so do not need something like that! In general I enjoy your candles!! Patricia A Jackson
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Overall -- I'd recommend the product. Perhaps shipping is too hard on the votives themselves.
customer_reviews.text: CONS: Some candles arrived broken so you have to account for a handful or so being unusable. The wicks aren't affixed very well, but I just heat the bottoms of the candles in order to attach the metal base of the wick to the body of the candle and then we're good to rock'n'roll. PROS: Easy to clean up after they're done burning in my himalayan sea salt lamps (I've found that other votive candles tend to really stick to the salt and are nearly impossible to clean out of the space where the votives go). Burn for a long time! No scent whatsoever! Great value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & last more than 10 hours if you put ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful & last more than 10 hours if you put in a snug votive holder. If you put in a clear votive holder you'll get a bright light If you put in a frosted votive holder you'll get a soft "romantic" type lighting. A couple came cracked in half, but once you put in the votive holder the wax melts over the crack and seals it. Can't even tell. Loved these.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Tokarz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible product
customer_reviews.text: absolutely terrible do not buy this product you might as well throw your money in the garbage or just light it on fire they don't stay lit they're absolutely terrible they burn unevenly look terrible you end up throwing them away forget the fact that they're supposed to last for 10 hours they might last for two if it doesn't end up burning so unevenly that you have to pull it out and throw it away before that happens shame on Amazon for allowing the seller to sell such a inferior product on their site
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Seriously good, worth your cash.
customer_reviews.text: they arrived just fine. A couple were very slightly damaged but not broken. I was sure it wasn't going to last even two hours, but it was still going after seven. I set a timer and everything. Had to extinguish it before bed,, but I'm pretty confident these tiny candles will burn even longer than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: zevo

customer_reviews.title: Even Burning, Tall, Pretty Votives
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a large quantity of these votives for my nephew's wedding decor, mainly because they are 2", taller than most votives and fit perfectly in the candleholders I have. I was worried after seeing some bad reviews for other votive candles online, so I tested one of these immediately. It burns brightly, evenly, and for a long time. I finally blew it out after 10 hours and what's left can probably burn for a few more hours. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Sister

customer_reviews.title: Best present I've ever
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid candle burner. My family knows this about me. Last year for xmas my wife got these candles and when xmas came again I asked for these as a gift. They burn clean, they burn fully to the bottom, they do not leave a high soot residue on my walls (in sconces) or on the glass votive holder. Literally there is nothing negative to report on these. They ship fast, well protected, 5+ stars IMO
customer_reviews.author: SyniBella

customer_reviews.title: A BOX OF WARPED CANDLES
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and they arrived in a box that was badly damaged and all the candles were warped out a shape , probably from the heat in the ups truck, or warehouse , only a few I could use to stand up straight. I wont be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Blue horses

customer_reviews.title: Quality candles; received wrong color
customer_reviews.text: First purchase of this product. Long lasting candles, burnt total of five hours and they are have way done. No smoke. Seems like good quality, not flakey but smooth and solid. Dome top, not flat. Ordered white and got ivory; not a big deal for me I just burn them around my house. Maybe a big deal for someone decorating for a wedding or event that needed white. No scent which is what was described. Box a bit flimsy. However, for the price and quality they are good candles. I may try another brand as there are a lot of these on the market. I would recommend if you don’t mind ivory.
customer_reviews.author: V. Kirkbride

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I compared many different votives before purchasing these. I picked these due to the high ratings and the description saying they lasted 10 hours. I got them for my wedding and they were all completely melted/burnt out by 1-2 hours in.... thankfully I had other candles as well but very disappointed with this purchase and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: The right size holder makes it burn longer!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to amend my original review of these candles. Originally the candles only burned for 4 hours or so. Today, I tried one in a much smaller votive holder. I lit it at 10 a.m. today and it just went out around 8 p.m. So if you want them to burn a long time, find a votive holder that is close to the size of the candle!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Color is not pure white, it is cream. Keep in mind for decorating.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't unpack the whole box, but they looked in good condition. However, the picture, description, and lable in the box all day/ show white candles, but they are a creamy color, so if your using them for a wedding (like I am) and specifically want a pure white candle, I would go with something else. But I'm not going to be that picky, so I will make due.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than a real votive
customer_reviews.text: These candies measured 1inch tall x 1 inch wide, like a finger stub. Much smaller than what I expected. The votives I buy in a botánica are usually twice the size but I’ll use these for my magick and see how long they last. Next time I’ll look for bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Deseno Grafix

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I burn a few candles a day .... so far 7 candles have no wicks and I’m sure there will be more . I’m very disappointed and certainly can’t and won’t reccomend them at all. Silvia Wolfson
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Wolfson

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Arrived on time and product was as ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our annual Christmas luminaries. Great product. Arrived on time and product was as described. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rondi5

customer_reviews.title: Future Long time customer
customer_reviews.text: I went through the first book and had to order another I like them so much. Perfect for tarot readings, rituals, invocations, evocations and even summoning or basic spell work. I love ya all for this perfect product
customer_reviews.author: Lelene Book Reviews & More

customer_reviews.title: A fair product
customer_reviews.text: They last a good while and there is no scent which is what I am looking for, but they are not the best vigil candles that I've used for prayer. They are an overall fair product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Mendoza Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Really good candles at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Really good candles at a bargain price. Burn uniformly; don't gutter in center with unmelted wax on edges. We'd buy them again. Give this vendor a chance; we'll light a candle for them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my daughter's wedding. At first, ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter's wedding. At first, was concerned they would not burn as long as stated but was thrilled that the burn time was 7 hours and counting. Note: the candles burn down quickly at first but don't worry, they will continue to burn for many hours. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Olin

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with purchasing these votive candles
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with purchasing these votive candles. I must admit that when I first looked at the candles they looked like they would not last long burning, but I was pleasantly surprised at how long they burn. I am using the candles on my ancestral altar and they last the right amount of time. I don't have to replace as often as I did before. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Worthless candles!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are terrible. They look nice in the package, burn nicely for 1/2 hour, then they barely have a flicker for another 15 minutes, then they go out. After that they never light up well again. They can't really be called candles. DON'T waste your money fi you actually want light from the candles. I went on the site to return them and realize my return window has closed. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not made in the USA and a life of 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: The box is clearly marked made in Malaysia. Now suspicious, I tested under pretty much ideal conditions. Timed out at 6 hours. Can I have 40% of my money back?
customer_reviews.author: Davio

customer_reviews.title: These candles are great, I get about 12 hrs burn time in ...
customer_reviews.text: These candles are great, I get about 12 hrs burn time in a breezy conditions.. I have no doubt that they would burn the full 15 if kept out of the breeze. No smoke and clean burning, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: charles m

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I read some bad reviews and was worried about how I would receive these candles. But so far so good! Im running out already so I will probably buy them again. They last for a pretty long time and the packaging was good.
customer_reviews.author: Yahaira villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Packaging issue
customer_reviews.text: I like these candles. They burn well but many were broken in the box. Packaging needs improvement
customer_reviews.author: Maria McKay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: mice like to eat candle wax, so store in a plastic container
customer_reviews.author: ram

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the wick size is so small that they are hard to even keep lit. They put out such little light because size of wick. Quality is not good. Might be cheaper than others but definitely poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Nice unscented candles, used for my wedding center pieces. Only complaint is they burn super fast, but for the money I felt like this was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a single candle has burned for anywhere near the claimed time yet. They all fall apart and smell like chemicals. Feel like I wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: These candles do not melt cleanly, but for the money they are a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that these candles are not true votives but they do the job. I still waste too much of the wax as the wick does not last until all the wax has been consumed. But again, for the price they are acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Longevity
customer_reviews.text: I loveeee them ! They last more than 3 hours , I would buy similar ones and they would be done in 40 min ! These are great
customer_reviews.author: Mala

customer_reviews.title: Candles
customer_reviews.text: Package came with a hole in it but nothing was damaged or lost. Luckily I had bought a bunch of stuff so it came with the rest of the things inside one large box. They look nice but have no smell
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Broken Candles
customer_reviews.text: This order arrived but the packaged got lost with UPS and when I finally got them they were broken. I had to figure out how to still be able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last quite as long as advertised
customer_reviews.text: No scent at all (which is great), but these don’t burn quite as long as advertised
customer_reviews.author: keen king

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: What I expected and what I wanted. Great value for the money. Light candles all the time and these have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Might lose a customer !!
customer_reviews.text: 7 out of the first 10 candles did NOT last 4 hrs !! STOP saying 10hrs. NO WAY JOSE !!! They burn so fast some turned into a puddle within 3 hrs. I'm upset.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Best candle value
customer_reviews.text: These candles are the best value I’ve found in a while. They last long, have no scent (as advertised) and burn nicely. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Biederman

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: We have 50 luminary bags we put out each Christmas Eve. These are just the perfect fit, are easy to light and last several hours. Makes the house look beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Laura D W

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: They burn for ten hours or longer as advertised EVERY time! I have already re-ordered them several times. If you want a long burning candle, these are the ones to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pam H,

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great candles but they arrived all beat up and loose scattered all over the box. Just horrible/non-existent packaging for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Long, clean, burn!
customer_reviews.text: We burned the candles at 40th birthday party. They burned clean and evenly. the party lasted about 4 hours and the candles weren't even close to halfway burned. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Eschbach

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Reese candles don't stay on They make popping noises in splash wax all over the place
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Don't Let these candles pass you by!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was longing for. Great value. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: They did not last as long as I liked
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you get what you pay for. They did not last through my entire reception but not too bad for the amount you spend on them!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Best votives I have found for best price!
customer_reviews.text: They came in less than 48 hours. They looked nice and burned great for 5 hours. They look like they will burn for 5 more hours. They are the cheapest in price that I have found, and I have shopped for votives off and on for 11 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable candles
customer_reviews.text: We used these for candles at our wedding. They burned all night and were the perfect size for the votive holders we got!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Harbeck

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous. Will be buying more soon!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! They're exactly as described and while the packaging is a little flimsy, you get what you ask for and more. I constantly burn candles so the longevity is something I'm not confident in comparing to other brands, but I will confirm that they will last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition, burns a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this due to the bad reviews. My candles arrived in perfect condition. I test burned a candle and so far it has burned over 5 hours and has only burned down about half way. I suggest putting in in in a votive container so it burns evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Foxwell

customer_reviews.title: Smell weird but work good
customer_reviews.text: there is a bit of a weird smell but otherwise were fine
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quantity
customer_reviews.text: As pictured & had no problems with the shipping or the actual product. Good price for the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product and fast delivery. Couldn't ask for better servicce
customer_reviews.author: Ron P B

customer_reviews.title: candlelight
customer_reviews.text: These seem less robust than I expected. Their quality is on the skimpy side in terms of wick, quantity and quality of wax. Still, it is always good to light a candle!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie E. Reisner

customer_reviews.title: the wicks are nice and long burns a long time
customer_reviews.text: lov how long they burn not messy the wicks are nice and long
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Good price but short, uneven burn
customer_reviews.text: These candles last about five hours, if that, and they burn hot and unevenly. One of them shattered the glass votive candle container. Good price, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Z.

customer_reviews.title: Burn well, last as they are supposed to
customer_reviews.text: They were a great replacement for my empty votive holders
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Don't order candles in summer!
customer_reviews.text: Candles delivered melted and stuck together. Order candles in fall and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for luminaries
customer_reviews.text: These candles burned over 7 hours. very few of them needed to be replaced. Yes, the wick fell through the hole but it happened only a few times. We had an 800 candle luminary and it was a success. Buying these again next year. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Multiple broken on arrival, messy, but good
customer_reviews.text: 6 of the candles were broken in half when we opened the box and there were shavings of wax coating all over the box and candles that made for a very messy unpacking experience. The candles that are fully in tact will work great once they are cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I like this size candle (1") better than the tea lights, because they burn longer, look great in whatever votive you use and there is no waste (just get the candle, no metal holder). I also like the fact that the candles are shipped without additional, wasteful packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Burns Clean
customer_reviews.text: Nice inexpensive candles. Clean burning, and last between 9-10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Baker

customer_reviews.title: great votive candles and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: arrived well packaged with no damage. color was perfect, a nice white without that blue tinge.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for some great candles. these burn for hours and hours and look lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Candles
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughters wedding did a test run on candles lasted 8 hrs which is wonderful. Just a quick note put a little drop of water in bottom of votive candle holder and left over wax comes out like a breeze!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burns completely . No waste.
customer_reviews.text: They burn completely. Last very long. I lite it every morning while I eat breakfast. It starts my day off just right. Reminds me of the light present in each of us that must shine forth in our world.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Wicks not good on these candles
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it was cheap and plentiful, BUT, the wicks are a problem. If the wick slips into the wax, you cannot light it at all. So far, I’ve had this issue with several of the candles.
customer_reviews.author: LB Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: votive candles
customer_reviews.text: These are for a votive wedding favor I put together. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat these candles for the price. Good quality, long burn time. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Magic Mike

customer_reviews.title: Candles worked well, but wicks fell out of them almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: The candles worked well and lasted for a long time. However, I would just caution that the wicks fell out of them very easily and so needed to be handled with care. I could put the wicks back into the candle - threaded them up from the bottom through the candle, so they were usable in all but one - but it was a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived undamaged and worked perfect for the votives I used for a birthday party centerpiece. Great when you need larger quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: Wished They Were Bigger, but They’re Good
customer_reviews.text: A litter smaller than I anticipated, but they last long and are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Burns well
customer_reviews.text: Burn time is as stated. I was not thrilled about the packaging, but at this price it was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jim sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good product - excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect candles for our Christmas Eve Luminaries - we will be buying them each year going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Jensen

customer_reviews.title: A perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: We use these for replacing the candle in Pottery Barn votives. No need to throw those away, just refill them with these votives. They work wonderfuly.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Henderson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Dreadful! Every single candle was stuck to each other. It was one big melted mess. Could not use one single candle! I should have paid more attention to the other reviews. Hope prospective buys pay attention to mine.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Last over 11 hours. I will keep buying this product in the future. ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: These are just as described
customer_reviews.text: They all came packaged well and no broken candles as reported in some earlier posts.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Norris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my mom. She burns one a day. They are long lasting and burn well. Better quality and price than local Walmart where she was buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they did what they were supposed to do - light a wedding reception almost exclusively by candle light.
customer_reviews.author: fred wilber

customer_reviews.title: Smart Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Money saver if you love lighting candles on a regular!
customer_reviews.author: Kaffia

customer_reviews.title: Quality above the price.👍
customer_reviews.text: This candles last as described, they don't produce any smoke and wax feels high quality, not greasy. Definitely a 5 stars product. I'm happy with my new candles! 😆😆😆
customer_reviews.author: David Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: does not last 10 hours
customer_reviews.text: The votive candles are about 1-1/4 inches tall, much smaller than what I'm used to in votive candles, and do not last 10 hours. Easy to clean the wax from the votive holders though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not burn well
customer_reviews.text: I used these in a wedding in votives. Many candles did not light at all. Others began to melt immediately after being lit. Did not last long. Turned into puddles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fast and right on point
customer_reviews.text: super fast and exactly what was described was what was sent . 100 percent happy .I made baby shower gifts from them and everyone was super happy
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I initially was upset that I did not receive these candles and was charged, only find out that they were delivered and was confused with another order. So sorry seller, love the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Barbaranne Dube'

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are perfect. This is my second box. I use them to refill glass votive holders instead of buying the entire product again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan McGarey Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Quality Candles
customer_reviews.text: Used for Buddhist practice shrine. 3rd order - love them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great votive candles!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! Bought these for our daughters wedding. They are wonderful! I will return for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Soso!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the candles are missing wicks and refuse to burn when lit
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: These will be perfect for my daughters wedding == 10 hours will be ...
customer_reviews.text: These will be perfect for my daughters wedding == 10 hours will be plenty of time! Thank you for a reasonable cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crappy, cheap, messy candles
customer_reviews.text: The wicks fall out of the bottom of these candles that drip all over the place. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Noodle Mom

customer_reviews.title: They look great.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our DIY wedding. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Al-varito

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for neighborhood luminaries!
customer_reviews.text: These lasted for a long time! Awesome for luminaries in our neighborhood!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: Votive Candles
customer_reviews.text: The candles arrived on time and as described, and none were broken or damaged. I would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Jones

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my wedding reception. They lasted for the 6 hours that they were burning and more! They were exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken candles.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought these candles. First time the candles were perfect but the second set of Candles arrived broken. And wax all over the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Votive Candle, Unscented Ivory Wax, Box of 72, for Wedding, Birthday, Holiday & Home Decoration (10 Hour) by Royal Imports
product_meta.description:
Size:10 Hour| Color:IvoryUpdated: Now burns 10 hours


Illuminate your home or special event with these attractive unscented ivory votive candles by Royal Imports. These 1.3” votive candles are crafted with high quality ivory wax and cotton wick. The combination of these two elements will ultimately result in a clean and smokeless burn. The wax used in this votive candle is of the highest caliber and is made the USA. It is guaranteed not to drip or melt away fast. The average burn time for this candle is 9-10 hours which outperforms most regular votives. The extended burn time allows you to re-use this candle for multiple events thus adding value to your product. Place it on a table or in a lantern to create an attractive addition to any occasion including, wedding reception, garden, spa, bedroom, etc.

Royal Imports brings the highest quality candles and candle holders to the floral and event industry. Each 1.3"x1.5" inch candle is crafted to perfection thus creating a sleek, flawless accent.
